citation.article-title: Rhodococcus maanshanensis sp. nov., a novel actinomycete from soil
citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Description of Rhodococcus maanshanensis sp. nov.
Rhodococcus maanshanensis (ma.an.shan.en'sis. N.L. adj. maanshanensis referring to Maanshan, the source of the soil from which the organism was isolated)
Aerobic, Gram-positive, non-acid-fast, non-motile actinomycete that forms a branched substrate mycelium that fragments into rod- and coccoid-like elements.
Convex, cream-coloured colonies with slightly irregular edges are formed on Bennett's and TSB agars.
Neither aerial hyphae nor diffusible pigments are formed.
Nitrate is reduced to nitrite and catalase and urease are produced but the organism is oxidase-negative.
Does not metabolize 2,4- dinitrophenol, 2,4,6-trichlorophenol or phenol.
Adenine, aesculin, arbutin and Tweens 20, 60 and 80 are degraded but not casein, elastin, guanine, hypoxanthine, starch, tyrosine or xanthine.

Acid is formed from D-fructose, D-glucose and glycerol but not from L-arabinose, D-cellobiose, D-galactose, inulin, D-lactose, D-maltose, D-mannitol, D-mannose (weak), D-raffinose, D-ribose (weak), α-L-rhamnose, starch, dsucrose, D-trehalose or D-xylose.

D-Fructose, D-glucose, D-melezitose, salicin, sodium fumarate and sodium propionate are used as sole carbon and energy sources but adonitol, dulcitol, meso-erythritol, D-fucose, D-raffinose, starch, xylitol, formate, hippurate and tartrate are not.
Utilization of other substrates as sole carbon and energy sources is given in Table 1.
L-Alanine is used as a sole carbon and nitrogen source but not acetamide, L-asparagine, L-aspartate, D-glucosamine or L-serine.
Grows well between 25 and 30 °C and between pH 6.0 and 8.5, but not in the presence of lysozyme.
Growth occurs at NaCl concentrations up to 5%, but not at 6 or 7% (w/v).
The G­C content of the DNA of the type strain is 66.2 mol%.
Isolated from a soil sample collected from Maanshan Mountain, Anhui Province, China.
The type strain is strain M712T (=AS 4.1720T=JCM 11374T).
